examples: What's the one thing VCs never tell you about fundraising?

What's the one thing CEOs never tell you about leadership?

examples: How do top performers manage to stay focused every single time?
How do serial entrepreneurs manage to spot opportunities every single time?

patterns.template: What if I told you {surprising_fact}? Would you believe me?
examples: What if I told you 90% of success is just showing up? Would you believe me?
What if I told you your biggest weakness is your superpower? Would you believe me?
What if I told you failure is more valuable than success? Would you believe me?

patterns.template: Why does {action} feel so {emotion}, but {opposite_action} doesn't?
examples: Why does saying no feel so hard, but saying yes doesn't?
Why does starting feel so difficult, but continuing doesn't?
Why does criticism feel so painful, but praise doesn't?

examples: Ready to learn why 87% of entrepreneurs fail at scaling?
Ready to learn why 92% of people fail at habit building?
Ready to learn why 76% of startups fail at marketing?
